thread.title: Source: Red Hat is buying Ansible for more than $100M

author: newsr.in
title: Source: Red Hat is buying Ansible for more than $100M
text: EXCLUSIVE: Publicly traded enterprise software company Red Hat has acquired devops software startup Ansible for more than $100 million, VentureBeat has learned. Red Hat will announce the news as soon as tomorrow, a source familiar with the matter told VentureBeat. Ansible cofounder and chief executive Saïd Ziouani spent a decade at Red Hat as a vice […] »
